item.title: Item requirments
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

STOP BUMPING!

case 879: { if (playerLevel[10] >= 40) { addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[10]), 10); addItem(377, 1); sendMessage("You Fish For Lobster...Got One!"); } else if (playerLevel[10] <= 40 { sendMessage("You Need A Fishing Level Of 40 To Fish For Lobster"); } if (hasItem == POTID); hasItem = true; addItem(377, 1); } else if (hasItem == POTID); hasItem = false; sendMessage("You need a lobster pot!");
Correct me if I’m wrong, and I wrote that in 5 seconds, so if you get errors, modify it.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 07:40:49 PM[/size][hr]You might need a boolean:

public boolean hasPot() { if(playerHasItem2(POTID) { return true; } return false; }

Read full topic
